title: The Eagle and the Sword
description: While training Arthor, the Eagle of Thor, to lead the Celts in victory, Merlin realizes that his pupil is a naive and bloodthirsty boy who revels in killing, and Merlin must race against time to find the sword of goodness and light to release Arthor from his urge to kill. Reprint.
author: A.A. Attanasio
